Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: globe-trot \globe"-trot`\, globetrot \globe"trot`\v. i. to travel all over the world for pleasure and sightseeing. -- {globe"-trot`ter}, n. -- {globe"-trot`ting}, a. [WordNet 1.5]
globetrotter n : someone who travels widely and often [syn: {world traveler}]
